content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Córdoba 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Córdoba 0.
Offside, Barcelona. Martín Montoya tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Córdoba 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt missed. Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nabil Ghilas.
Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Foul by Xavi (Barcelona).
Fausto Rossi (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Córdoba 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Daniel Pinillos.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Córdoba 0. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Xavi with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Fede Cartabia (Córdoba).
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Substitution, Córdoba. López Silva replaces Borja García.
Foul by Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba).
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona).
Foul by Fausto Rossi (Córdoba).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Córdoba. Fausto Rossi replaces Luso.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) because of an injury.
Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona).
Eduard Campabadal (Córdoba) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Xavi replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt blocked. Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Córdoba. Daniel Pinillos replaces Íñigo López because of an injury.
Foul by Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Luso (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Córdoba 0. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro.
Offside, Córdoba. Borja García tries a through ball, but José Ángel Crespo is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by José Ángel Crespo.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Córdoba 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Córdoba 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Juan Carlos Martín.
Attempt saved. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Juan Carlos Martín.
Attempt saved. Jordi Alba (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Attempt saved. Luso (Córdoba) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fede Cartabia.
Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) hits the left post with a left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left. Assisted by Nabil Ghilas.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Eduard Campabadal.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Íñigo López.

Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).

Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Nabil Ghilas (Córdoba) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Luso following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Fede Cartabia (Córdoba) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Deivid with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Patrick Ekeng (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Jordi Alba with a cross.
Attempt saved. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Eduard Campabadal.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Córdoba 0. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the top right corner. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a through ball.

Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
